name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: External identifier - FHIR will generate its own internal identifiers (probably URLs) which do not need to be explicitly managed by the resource.  The identifier here is one that would be used by another non-FHIR system - for example an automated medication pump would provide a record each time it operated; an administration while the patient was off the ward might be made with a different system and entered after the event.  Particularly important if these records have to be updated.

name: $addidentifier
desc: External identifier - FHIR will generate its own internal identifiers (probably URLs) which do not need to be explicitly managed by the resource.  The identifier here is one that would be used by another non-FHIR system - for example an automated medication pump would provide a record each time it operated; an administration while the patient was off the ward might be made with a different system and entered after the event.  Particularly important if these records have to be updated.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: External identifier - FHIR will generate its own internal identifiers (probably URLs) which do not need to be explicitly managed by the resource.  The identifier here is one that would be used by another non-FHIR system - for example an automated medicati

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this event.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this event.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this event.

name: $partOf
desc: Returns: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

name: $addpartOf
desc: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

name: $context
desc: Returns: The encounter or episode of care that establishes the context for this MedicationStatement.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The encounter or episode of care that establishes the context for this MedicationStatement.

name: $status
desc: Returns: A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the medication used that this statement is about.  Generally this will be active or completed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the medication used that this statement is about.  Generally this will be active or completed.

name: $category
desc: Returns: Indicates where type of medication statement and where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates where type of medication statement and where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered.

name: $dateAsserted
desc: Returns: The date when the medication statement was asserted by the information source.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date when the medication statement was asserted by the information source.

name: $informationSource
desc: Returns: The person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication. Note: Use derivedFrom when a MedicationStatement is derived from other resources, e.g Claim or MedicationRequest.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication. Note: Use derivedFrom when a MedicationStatement is derived from other resources, e.g Claim or MedicationRequest.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The person, animal or group who is/was taking the medication.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The person, animal or group who is/was taking the medication.

name: $derivedFrom
desc: Returns: Allows linking the MedicationStatement to the underlying MedicationRequest, or to other information that supports or is used to derive the MedicationStatement.

name: $addderivedFrom
desc: Allows linking the MedicationStatement to the underlying MedicationRequest, or to other information that supports or is used to derive the MedicationStatement.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Allows linking the MedicationStatement to the underlying MedicationRequest, or to other information that supports or is used to derive the MedicationStatement.

name: $taken
desc: Returns: Indicator of the certainty of whether the medication was taken by the patient.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicator of the certainty of whether the medication was taken by the patient.

name: $reasonNotTaken
desc: Returns: A code indicating why the medication was not taken.

name: $addreasonNotTaken
desc: A code indicating why the medication was not taken.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A code indicating why the medication was not taken.

name: $reasonCode
desc: Returns: A reason for why the medication is being/was taken.

name: $addreasonCode
desc: A reason for why the medication is being/was taken.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A reason for why the medication is being/was taken.

name: $reasonReference
desc: Returns: Condition or observation that supports why the medication is being/was taken.

name: $addreasonReference
desc: Condition or observation that supports why the medication is being/was taken.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Condition or observation that supports why the medication is being/was taken.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Provides extra information about the medication statement that is not conveyed by the other attributes.

name: $addnote
desc: Provides extra information about the medication statement that is not conveyed by the other attributes.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Provides extra information about the medication statement that is not conveyed by the other attributes.

name: $dosage
desc: Returns: Indicates how the medication is/was or should be taken by the patient.

name: $adddosage
desc: Indicates how the medication is/was or should be taken by the patient.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates how the medication is/was or should be taken by the patient.
